description: [KV Botnet Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0035) includes use of native system tools, such as uname, to obtain information about victim device architecture, as well as gathering other system information such as the victim's hosts file and CPU utilization.(Citation: Lumen KVBotnet 2023)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2023, December 13). Routers Roasting On An Open Firewall: The KV-Botnet Investigation. Retrieved June 10, 2024.
